about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: We are the official distributor of the French company Argeville in Uzbekistan. Our expertise lies in wholesale and large-scale supply of high-quality oil perfumes and amber bases.
about.paragraph2: Through direct cooperation with the manufacturer in France, we guarantee authenticity and premium product quality, competitive terms for partners, reliable deliveries, and professional service.

1.name: Fruit Fragrances
1.description: Sweet, juicy, and playful with notes of fresh fruits.

2.name: Spice Fragrances
2.description: Warm, bold, and exotic with rich spice accords.

3.name: Flower Fragrances
3.description: Romantic and elegant with delicate floral notes.

4.name: Citrus Fragrances
4.description: Bright, fresh, and uplifting with zesty citrus.
